xades4j.algorithms

Class XPath2FilterTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • xades4j.algorithms.Algorithm
      • xades4j.algorithms.XPathTransformBase
        • xades4j.algorithms.XPath2FilterTransform

  • public final class XPath2FilterTransform
extends XPathTransformBase
    The XPath 2.0 transform. Instances of the transform can be initially created using the static methods of XPath2FilterTransform.XPath2Filter: intersect, subtract, and union. The transform can them be composed as follows:

    XPath2FilterTransform t = XPath2Filter.subtract("xpath1").intersect("xpath2");

    Author:
    Lu√≠s

      • withNamespace

        public XPath2FilterTransform withNamespace(java.lang.String prefix,
                                           java.lang.String namespace)
        Registers a namespace and the corresponding prefix to be used when resolving the XPath filter expressions of the current transform. For simplicity, the namespace declaration will be added to all the resulting XPath parameter elements.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the namespace prefix
        namespace - the namespace URI
        Returns:
        the current instance
